sentences.en: "Get the guy in the purple shirt." — "All right, my man."
sentences.cn: “把那个穿紫衬衫的家伙叫过来。”——“好的，老兄。”

sentences.en: A purple may be made by dyeing a blue over a red.
sentences.cn: 红色染上蓝色便可成为紫色。

sentences.en: All shades of mauve, lilac, lavender and purple were fashionable.
sentences.cn: 深深浅浅的各种木槿色、丁香色、熏衣草色和紫色都是流行色。

sentences.en: Beckham wore a fetching outfit in purple and green.
sentences.cn: 贝克汉姆穿了一件抢眼的紫绿两色套装。

sentences.en: He is in purple.
sentences.cn: 他穿着紫色的衣服.

sentences.en: His boots and purple beret identify him as commanding the Scottish Paratroops.
sentences.cn: 他的长靴和紫色贝雷帽表明他统领着苏格兰伞兵部队。

sentences.en: His face turned purple with rage.
sentences.cn: 他气得脸色发紫。

sentences.en: His face was purple with rage.
sentences.cn: 他气得脸色发紫。

sentences.en: His hands were purple with cold.
sentences.cn: 他的双手冻紫了.

sentences.en: How beautiful the purple flower is!
sentences.cn: 那朵紫色的花多漂亮 啊 !

sentences.en: Its large leaves often show a delicate purple tint.
sentences.cn: 它的大叶子往往带点紫色。

sentences.en: Purple, though beautiful, adds years to the age.
sentences.cn: 紫色虽美, 但会使人显得老气.

sentences.en: She had a purple dress on with a silver-white necklace.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一条紫色的连衣裙配着一条银白色的项链。

sentences.en: She was dressed in purple.
sentences.cn: 她穿一身紫色衣裳。

sentences.en: She was wearing an unbecoming shade of purple.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一身不相配的紫色衣服。

sentences.en: The avenues lined with jacaranda trees burst into a carnival of purple.
sentences.cn: 大街的两旁种着蓝花楹，绽放的花朵汇成一片紫色的海洋。

sentences.en: the deep purple flowers so beloved by artists
sentences.cn: 受艺术家青睐的深紫色花

sentences.en: The priest wore a purple vestment to conduct the funeral services.
sentences.cn: 牧师穿上紫色法衣主持葬礼仪式.

sentences.en: They crossed a field stippled with purple weeds.
sentences.cn: 他们穿过点缀着紫色草的田地.

sentences.en: Which one do you like, the green or the purple?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢哪一件，绿色的还是紫色的？

phrases.tran_cn: 紫心锭（右旋安非他命，兴奋剂）

trans.tran_cn: 紫色的，帝王的，词藻华美的
trans.tran_en: having a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue

trans.tran_cn: 紫色，紫（红）衣，紫袍，帝位，皇权，皇族
trans.tran_en: a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue
a dark colour that is a mixture of red and blue
